titles.title: You saw me in your need

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
You saw me in my need
You paid the price for me
And through Your love
I have been set free
Now I am not the same
You took my sin and shame
Forever I will bless Your Holy Name

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
I adore You
I adore You
Lamb of God
My Savior, Prince of Peace

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
I adore You
I adore You
Jesus You mean all the world to me
I adore You Lord.
